# stage1
RPI4="2500MB"
RPI3="2500MB"
RPI0="2250MB"
DEBIAN_VERSION="buster"

# stage2
user="pi"
passwd="board"

PKGS1="tzdata keyboard-configuration sudo man-db dbus initramfs-tools \
	cloud-initramfs-growroot e2fsprogs u-boot-tools fonty-rg patch \
	curl wget apt-transport-https dirmngr cmake rsync"

PKGS2="cpu hwinfo neofetch haveged resolvconf git build-essential net-tools \
        ifplugd fuse wpasupplicant wireless-tools usbutils alsa-utils gettext \
        wget mc nano figlet toilet curl dialog python3 python3-setuptools \
        openssh-client openssh-server ntfs-3g htop bc zram-tools libncursesw5-dev \
        bison flex libssl-dev autopoint autoconf automake pkg-config libtool"
